item.title: Artist's special
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 30 ml Scotch
  • 30 ml Oloroso sherry
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml grenadine or redcurrant or raspberry syrup
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Aviation
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 50 ml gin
  • 20 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur
  • 5 ml sugar syrup
  • 5ml crème de violette (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Brandy crusta
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml brandy
  • 15 ml triple sec
  • 15 ml lemon juice
  • 10 ml Maraschino liqueur (optional)
  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) sugar
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

Sugar rim a cocktail glass. Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with long lemon twist lining the inside of the glass.

item.title: Paper plane
item.description:
Amaro Nonino is expensive so feel free to substitute for a similar (or different) amaro.

Ingredients

  • 20ml bourbon
  • 20ml Aperol
  • 20ml Amaro Nonino
  • 20ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist or miniature paper plane

Instructions

Shake ingredients with ice. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish.

item.title: Pisco sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 45 ml pisco
  • 30 ml lime juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 1/2 egg white
  • (garnish) aromatic bitters
  • (garnish) lime slice

Instructions

Dry shake ingredients. Then shake with ice. Serve in a rocks glass without ice. Garnish with drops of bitters and a lime slice.
